Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0 beta 1
Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0 beta 1

Electrolysis is blocking Tab Animation. All the tabs are having an abnormal behavior, after a while they turn black or disappear all together , eventually Firefox freezes.

STR:
1. Open Firefox 8.0 beta 1
2. Go to about:config
3. Add new Boolean: " browser.tabs.remote=true"
4. Restart Firefox

Actual results:
The tabs are starting to behave abnormally.

Expected results:
The tabs should behave normally.
